name: The biophilic city lecture
description: Lecture by Dr. Tim Beatley, Teresa Heinz Professor of Sustainable Communities, University of Virginia and Director of the Biophilic Cities Project.Biophilic cities can deliver multiple benefits to people, the environment and the economy. How do we integrate biophilic elements into our towns and cities so that they are in tune with ecological systems, foster place-based relationships and embody the attributes of nature in their design?
